caption.title: Residence in early life as a risk factor for asthma among schoolchildren enrolled in a case-control study between 2015–17 (N = 1,670)

tr.td: Born and spent first 5 years in rural (265)
Born in rural, spent first 5 years in urban (87)
Born in urban, spent first 5 years in rural (72)
Born and spent first 5 years in urban (1,246)

fn.p: N = number; Adj. OR = adjusted odds ratio; CI = confidence interval; number (%) shown in 2nd and 3rd column.
*Adjusted for age, sex, and father’s education level.
